It may appear very strange that a desci

As I grew older my attempts
in science were of a higher nature.
I endeavou produced little earthquakes
and tried every kind of combination
of gasses to and elements to ascertain
the results.

^
Among other questions suggested by natural objects I as eagerly enquired of my father
what
^
the nature & the origin of thunder and lightening. was. He
replied, electricity; describing at the same
time the effect of that power. He made constructed
a small electrical machine and exhi
bited a few experiments and made a
kite with a wire & string and which drew down
that fluid from the clouds.
This last blow st stroke compleated
the overthrow of Cornelius Agrippa, Albertus
Magnus and Paracelsus, who had so long
reigned the lords of my imagination. But
by some fatality I did not feel enclined to
commence any modern system and this
inclination disinclination was influenced by the following
circumstance.
My father expressed a wish that I

natural philosophy, to which I

From this time untill I went to

As I before mentioned my brothers
were much younger than myself.
Ernest the second of our family was five
Another task soon
^
also devolved upon
me when I became the instructor
of my brothers. Ernest was five years
younger than myself, and was my
principal pupil. He had been aflicted
with ill health from his infancy
thro which
Elizabeth and I had been his constant
m nurses I his disposition was gentle but
he was incapable any severe appli
cation. William the younge
st of our
family was quite a child and the
most beautiful little fellow in the
world, his lively blue eyes dimpled cheeks

and affectionate endearing manners
inspired the tenderest affection. Such
was our domestic circle from which
care and pain seemed for ever banish
ed. f My father directed our studies
and my mother partook of our
enjoyments. we were all equal
we none neither of
us possessed
an envied
preheminence
over the other
the
voice of command was never heard
among us but mutual affection

obey the slightest desire of each
other.
